settings.editor:
We gather to make our commitment to become free from suffering, help people with their spiritual 
growth and provide a safe and friendly space for nurturing holistic well-being.

settings.title: Meditation is one of the greatest ways to obtain inner peace and harmony.

There are many ways to volunteer at the temple. You don’t need a special skill or experience. We have many volunteer opportunities which can be undertaken by anyone without training.
If you do have a special skill, please let us know, as this would be a wonderful way to benefit the Dharma community.
